H0.text: what type of breast cancer did sheryl crow have. Ductal Carcinoma

H1.text: what type of breast cancer did sheryl crow have. Lobular Carcinoma

H2.text: what type of breast cancer did sheryl crow have. Medullary Carcinoma

H3.text: what type of breast cancer did sheryl crow have. Meningioma

A4.text: Crow was diagnosed with ductal carcinoma in situ (DCIS), a non-invasive form of breast cancer.

A5.text: Crow was diagnosed with a meningioma, the most common kind of brain tumor, usually benign, for which she continued to have regular follow-up exams.
